base_description: Gray rectangular box with a front handle.
part_description: Single door with a horizontal handle on the front; box-shaped body with flat top and sides.
internal_interaction_description: The door is attached to the main body with hinges, allowing it to swing open and closed. The handle provides a grip for opening the door, which seals against the body to enclose the interior space.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on a flat surface, interacting with users through the handle for opening and closing. It may house items inside, keeping them contained and protected from external elements.
